The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:The Untouchable
 This fight takes place in an instanced area.
On death, all unprotected items will be moved to a grave outside the instance. Any items left on the ground will be lost.

The Untouchable is the third boss fought in the quest Dream Mentor. This monster has very high Defence against melee and Ranged, but no Magic defence, so players should use Magic e.g. trident of the seas or Iban Blast in order to kill it effectively. It can be safespotted using the lectern to the north. After this monster is killed, it transforms into its fourth and final form, The Illusive.

The Untouchable, along with its previous form, is one of few monsters in Runescape that the player cannot walk through. Players should be warned that it is possible to get trapped by the edge of the arena next to the lectern, particularly when trying to set it up for safespotting. If this happens the player must either tank the damage it deals or escape using the lectern.

Note: Prayers cannot be utilised in this battle or any of the others before or after it. Should players die or choose to leave during the middle of the fight, they must start the entire battle over from The Inadequacy.

It can be fought in the Nightmare Zone after the quest is complete.

'''The Untouchable''' is the third boss fought in the quest [[Dream Mentor]]. This monster has very high [[Defence]] against [[melee]] and [[Ranged]], but no [[Magic]] defence, so players should use Magic e.g. [[trident of the seas]] or [[Iban Blast]] in order to kill it effectively. It can be [[safespot]]ted using the lectern to the north. After this monster is killed, it transforms into its fourth and final form, [[The Illusive]].

The Untouchable, along with its previous form, is one of few monsters in Runescape that the player cannot walk through. Players should be warned that it is possible to get trapped by the edge of the arena next to the lectern, particularly when trying to set it up for safespotting. If this happens the player must either tank the damage it deals or escape using the lectern.

'''Note:''' Prayers '''cannot''' be utilised in this battle or any of the others before or after it. Should players die or choose to leave during the middle of the fight, they must start the '''entire''' battle over from The Inadequacy.

It can be fought in the [[Nightmare Zone]] after the quest is complete.
